name: James Berzuk
text: Placed an order. Told price. Price seemed a bit high. An hour passed. Delivery driver called. He was lost. Gave him the address again. Half an hour passes. He called again. They don't deliver to us.

name: charlie dreyer
text: They were having some issues with their system and they were very courteous while I scrounged up the cash instead. Also I asked them to draw a cow on the box and they absolutely did. So far this is the only time someone has done that for me.

name: EB
text: These servers are champions of customer service. I need my pizza sometimes, you know how it gets?? SO I've been to Italy and this is the best pizza service I've ever gotten. ALL servers greet you with a smile and upon delivery they've always got a nice adage like "when it rains it pours." In this day and age that stands OUT

name: michael milbourn
text: Ordered delivery to a meeting that I was holding. The food got there right on time, it was hot, plates and napkins were there, and we got some great deals so lunch was inexpensive. I'm satisfied.

name: Angry Tenant
text: Driver takes two hours to deliver the pizza. I call the store, "Sadie" the Manager apparently,  she literally starts screaming about how the driver was on time and not their problem. I mention the driver was a little abrasive, she starts …More

name: Moi Ra
text:
Mostly for take away, so it only had like two tables. Usually you order before, so ordering at the time you arrive will probably take longer than normally.
Food was good.

name: Owyn Dominick
text: Wow. Running way, way late. My Roommate called to find out what was going on after over a half hour outside of the time frame. They say it could be ten more minutes because "traffic is bad" I live in Belltown. Traffic in between Queen Anne …More

name: Z H
text: Every time I've been in this location my pizza has been what I've expected and the service is nice. I have no reason to not give this place 5 stars.

name: D.J. DOUBLE J
text: Had pretty quick service and the employees seemed to be friendly at this Pizza Hut in Queen Anne. The pepperoni pizza with cherry peppers I ordered was cooked up very well and with a tasty crust, too. Lastly, the selection of fries they offer is also a satisfying option to buy into, here.

name: Riley Ritter
text: I haven't been to this Pizza Hut in a really long time. I thought it was odd the small pizza only costed 7 but it should be advertised that the thing is only 6" wide. Poorly made poorly cut pizza with the sauce from the last guys pizza spilled on your crust. Unappetizing. You get what you pay for.

name: Gerald Cook
text: Terrible service and don't be fooled that the name Pizza Hut is on the building, because damned if they are participating in any special you've seen advertised. $10 any size any topping from TV ads? Not here. $10 family dinner box advertised on TV and their own website? Not here.

name: WesDiz
text: They suck. Seriously this isn't a bogus post. Delivery time is over 2 hrs and their service is as if they don't want to work. Lames.

name: Justa NormalGirl
text: Pizza took over an hour more than what I was told, and when trying to get in contact with the store I was kept on hold for twenty minutes. …More

name: John Jenkins
text:
They have never taken less than 2 hours to deliver a pizza.

Today, I really wanted some Pizza Hut, so, at 1:45 in the afternoon, I ordered …More

name: Dana Priest
text:
Breaking the law...

"Hi, can you please tell me the ingredients in your pizza sauce?" I asked …More

name: Aviral Gupta
text: Pizza was doused with drizzle sauce leaving it tasteless. Plus a bonus HAIR on the pizza. When called, we were giving no apology and shift manager Ashley was rude and cold.

name: Knuc Loc
text: They act like doing there job is some sort of problem.  They litterally made me order online while sitting inside the store

name: Alanah Chantel
text: It was going to take 2.5 hours to deliver a pizza to my house that is about half a mile away. I'd only do carry out from this site or go somewhere else.

name: Jules Pineda
text: I waited over an hour for any news about my delivery, and when I did get news it was the delivery guy telling me he didn't know where I/he was. He then hung up and called about ten minutes later still lost and after many attempts of me …More

name: Devon Brown
text: Store closed permanently.  Don't bother.

name: Stevie Lofing
text: Quick and great pizza

name: pewvanmarkeye II
text:
I'm giving this a one
star like everyone else

name: Josh Brauner
text: Sorry to see this location go, had the beat Pizza Hut pizza I ever had.

name: Axel Vidales
text: Went for the pizza and stayed for the wings.

name: Sam Cohn
text: I'm rating one star without actually eating anything from here, as my pizza did not arrive. I called back to confirm they received my order, which they had, but I was informed that they decided it wasn't worth the effort to deliver my pizza

name: Mark Dahl
text: I ordered from them at 10:20 was told that my pizza will be here at 10:54 at 11:30 I called because my order has still not arrived and finally was forced to order from Domino's because it was too late to order from anyone else and they just didn't show up

name: Doel Cintron
text: Great

name: krissy adkins
text: Great customer service!

name: Lucas Beneditti
text: Slow service, when I came in they ran out of everything. Extremely dirty.

name: Pano Giannakopoulos
text: THESE GUYS JUST MADE ME CANCEL MY ORDER WHEN I TOLD THEM I ONLY HAD $100 FOR A $30 ORDER! I gave them a heads up over the phone for a delivery and instead of figuring out a way to get change on the way to deliver they actually made me cancel. That's service

name: Chad Moran
text: It was what you would expect from Pizza Hut.
